issues.info: If you find any bugs, or have any feature requests, please post them on the github!

interval.name: Interval
interval.description: This measures the amount of minutes between popups! It is recommended you use 10 - 20 minutes if you disable saving between sessions!

breakTime.name: Break Time
breakTime.description: This measures the amount of seconds your counter will start counting down from when you take a break!

Layers.name: Layers
Layers.description: You can enable / disable which layers the timer is active on with the settings in this list!

playLayer.name: Play Layer
playLayer.description: This setting enables or disables whether or not the timer is used while playing levels!

editorLayer.name: Editor
editorLayer.description: This setting enables or disables whether or not the timer is active in the editor!

saving.name: Save data
saving.description: These settings allow you to enable / disable saving data across levels / instances of gd!

useSaving.name: Save Timer Between Levels
useSaving.description: Timer continues between levels via save data!

resetTimeOnOpen.name: Reset timer on open
resetTimeOnOpen.description: resets the timer whenever you open the game

pauseAcrossLevels.name: Pause Across Levels
pauseAcrossLevels.description: When pausing the timer via quick settings, this setting will decide if pausing should persist across levels

resetPause.name: Unpause timer on open
resetPause.description: Controls if the timer should be unpause whenever the game is opened. It's recommended to enable this setting, so you don't forget to pause the timer!

useQuickSettings.name: Enable Quick settings Menu
useQuickSettings.description: Disables the button to open timer modificaitons and settings from pause menus.

resetOnInterval.name: Reset timer on new interval
resetOnInterval.description: Resets your current timer whenever you change the <cy>interval</c> setting

audioAlert.name: Use audio alerts
audioAlert.description: Enables sound effects to notify you when your timer is up!

interuptTriggers.name: Interupt triggers
interuptTriggers.description: This setting decides if the editor should interupt the player while editing triggers. Enabling this setting can lead to unsaved changes in triggers being lost
